text: And her husband rose up, and went after her 19. 3 Gr. to speak to her heart.to speak kindly to her, to recover her to himself; and 19. 3 Gr. his young man was, etc.he had his young man with him, and a pair of asses; and she brought him into the house of her father; and the father of the damsel saw him, and was well pleased to meet him.
